comments:
Description:
Damaged pdf file when preview attached report with frameset mode.
Build number:v2.1.3.20070517

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report and preview in Web Viewer.
2. Input parameter values as sample and 200.(note: the second value is important to reproduce the issue).

Expected result:
Display a table with chart and a list behind it.

Actual result:
Damanged pdf file.

Error log:
????: An error happened while running the report. Cause:
